parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: Position of the spacer within the CommandGroup NOTE: Specify 0 to add this a spacer to the beginning of the CommandGroup, or specify -1 to add it to the end of the CommandGroup. This argument specifies the position of the spacer in relation to its immediate parent item.

parameters.name: MenuTBOption
parameters.description: Command item type as defined in swCommandItemType_e

title: ICommandGroup.AddSpacer2
description: Adds a spacer between items in a CommandGroup.
signature:
System.Int32 AddSpacer2( 
   System.Int32
Position
,
   System.Int32
MenuTBOption
)

parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: Position of the spacer within the CommandGroup NOTE: Specify 0 to add this a spacer to the beginning of the CommandGroup, or specify -1 to add it to the end of the CommandGroup. This argument specifies the position of the spacer in relation to its immediate parent item.

parameters.name: MenuTBOption
parameters.description: Command item type as defined in swCommandItemType_e

returns: Index of the item within the CommandGroup as assigned by SOLIDWORKS
